member.name: M:Avalonia.Xaml.Interactions.Core.DataBindingHelper.RefreshDataBindingsOnActions(Avalonia.Xaml.Interactivity.ActionCollection)
member.summary: Ensures that all binding expression on actions are up to date.
member.remarks: fires during data binding phase. Since the is a child of the behavior, bindings on the action may not be up-to-date. This routine is called before the action is executed in order to guarantee that all bindings are refreshed with the most current data.
